cab.content: Operations.From:- F.M.. , C ,-in-C., France. To : - C . I *G *S *4th November, 1917.Despatched 7.39 p.m. Received 8.20 p.m.0.A.B./6.Following report from G.O.C., R.F.G."During last 24 hours low clouds and thick mist have prevent the Nancy squadrons from carrying out any operations,"Secretary-,War Cabinet.Forwarded for circulation to the Members of the v7ar Cabinet *General Staff,War Office.5th November, 1917.
